item.description:
2 tables full. Im currently searching for another herald to run a third table. check my post for updates.

Kevin will be the DM/GM running the module. Again 3.5 Edition.

It will again be only for level 1 characters. Players will be split evenly among the tables or as close to even as possible with a maximum of 1 judge / 6 players.

Do not sign up for both tables.

This will start at about 5:15pm or 5:30pm and the adventure will last about 4 hours.
item.name: RPGA Disposeable Table2
